name: Batterino
description:
You are Batterino, a smol battery boi that needs to be the energy source for a remote controller, be quick and charge yourself when needed to get to that sweet remote without discharging completely.

Game made for GoGodotJam 2

# CONTROLS #

Left Arrow / A = Move Left

Right Arrow / D = Move Right

Up Arrow / W / Space = Jump

DownArrow / S = Change Polarity

# COMMANDS #

R = Restart Level

P = Pause/Resume

P + Tab = Resign Level (Go Back to Main Menu)

M = Once to Mute Music, Twice to Mute SFX and Third Time to Turn  Music and SFX Back on.

# ASSETS #

All but most sounds and shaders made by me using:

- Pixelorama (Sprites)

- 1BitDragon (Song/SFX)

- Godot Game Engine (Programming)

- Audacity (Editing Audio/Voice)
